short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click & drag left or right on Netflix videos to adjust the playback speed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🔴 This is the Netflix version of the "Easy Speed Drag For YouTube" extension, available here: 
🌐 https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/lmcggcabhocpfkbddekmconplfjmmgmn


Speed Controls For Netflix Videos:
------
⏩ Click and hold anywhere on a Netflix video to play at 1.5x speed

➡️ Drag right for faster speeds.
⬅️ Drag left for slower speeds.

⬇️ Drag down before releasing the click to lock in the new speed.
▶️ Or, just release the click to return to normal speed.

*️⃣ To return to normal speed after you've locked in a new speed, just hold down a new click and release.


🎛️ Set the speeds tiers you want in the settings (anywhere from 0.1x to 16x)



Key Features: 
------
🧠 Incredibly Intuitive - Works exactly how you expect it to

⏭️ Skim Over The Boring Stuff - Easiest way to fast forward over bits of boring content

😃 Don't miss The Good Stuff - Never miss things you want to see by accidentally skipping over it. Easy to stop exactly when you want.

🥷 Never In Your Way - Extension adds features but does not interfere with any native features. It's only there when you want it to be.


What Else?
-
✅ No data collection
✅ No ads or monetization
✅ Minimal Permissions
